name: 7.62mm Incendiary Round
description: 7.62mm Incendiary Rounds are used by theBolt Action Rifle/Hunting Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Hitting a target will set it ablaze, dealing damage for approximately 20 seconds. Deals 8-11 damage a second to normal targets, and 16-22 damage a second to targets that are weak to fire. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere(TBA - no information yet).
